type: Landing Page Prototype. Creative direction, design and code. 2015
description: Built with HTML5, CSS3, Sass (Compass), Jquery, webfont from Adobe typekit, Grunt. This prototype is not responsive, designed only for screen resolution above 1900 pixels wide.
